name: Ext_R3_Goal_outcomeCode
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Goal.outcomeCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Goal.outcomeCode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Goal|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: What result was achieved regarding the goal?
element.definition: Identifies the change (or lack of change) at the point when the status of the goal is assessed.
element.comment: `Goal.outcomeCode` maps to R5 `Goal.outcome`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: What result was achieved regarding the goal?
element.definition: Identifies the change (or lack of change) at the point when the status of the goal is assessed.
element.comment: `Goal.outcomeCode` maps to R5 `Goal.outcome`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The result of the goal; e.g. "25% increase in shoulder mobility", "Anxiety reduced to moderate levels".  "15 kg weight loss sustained over 6 months"
